example.code:
PS C:\> Get-EC2InstanceAttribute -InstanceId i-12345678 -Attribute instanceType
InstanceType : t2.micro
example.description: This example describes the instance type of the specified instance.

example.code:
PS C:\> Get-EC2InstanceAttribute -InstanceId i-12345678 -Attribute sriovNetSupport
SriovNetSupport : simple
example.description: This example describes whether enhanced networking is enabled for the specified instance.

example.code:
PS C:\> (Get-EC2InstanceAttribute -InstanceId i-12345678 -Attribute groupSet).Groups
GroupId ------- sg-12345678 sg-45678901
example.description: This example describes the security groups for the specified instance.

example.code:
PS C:\> Get-EC2InstanceAttribute -InstanceId i-12345678 -Attribute ebsOptimized
EbsOptimized : False
example.description: This example describes whether EBS optimization is enabled for the specified instance.

example.code:
PS C:\> Get-EC2InstanceAttribute -InstanceId i-12345678 -Attribute disableApiTermination
DisableApiTermination : False
example.description: This example describes the 'disableApiTermination' attribute of the specified instance.

example.code:
PS C:\> Get-EC2InstanceAttribute -InstanceId i-12345678 -Attribute instanceInitiatedShutdownBehavior
InstanceInitiatedShutdownBehavior : stop
example.description: This example describes the 'instanceInitiatedShutdownBehavior' attribute of the specified instance.
